\n Eligibility\n: Salaried Executive: Minimum 1 year experience including 6 months with current employer
Professionals such as doctors, engineers,  freelancers and others with minimum 1 year of experience.
Businessman: Minimum 2 years involvement in the same business
Income Criteria: Minimum Income: Salaried Segment - BDT 40,000
\n Features\n: Loan amount ranging from BDT 3 lac to BDT 40 lac
Financing up to 50% of reconditioned or new vehicle price
Up to 100% financing for loan against cash security

\n Eligibility\n: Salaried Executive: Minimum 1 year experience including 6 months with current employer
Professionals such as doctors, engineers,  freelancers and others with minimum 1 year of experience.
Businessman: Minimum 2 years involvement in the same business
Income Criteria: Minimum Income: Salaried Segment - BDT 40,000, All other Segments – BDT 60,000
\n Features\n: Loan amount ranging from BDT 4 lac to BDT 40 lac
Financing up to 50% of used vehicle price
Up to 100% financing for loan against cash security
Loan tenure 12 months to 72 months. Loan maturity must be 10 years from date of manufacturing
Loan amount from BDT 2 lacs to BDT 20 lacs
Loan amount ranging from BDT 5 lac to BDT 200 lac
Financing up to 70% of property value
Top Up: Allowable after 3 months (Minimum BDT 1 Lac)

\n Loan type\n: Secured Loan: A term loan facility for any legitimate personal purpose against security deposit.
Secured Overdraft: A revolving facility for any legitimate personal purpose against security deposit.
secured Loan- Bullet Payment: A fixed term (monthly/quarterly interest payment) loan facility for any legitimate personal purpose against security deposit.
\n Features\n: Bullet Payment: 12 Months or 24 MonthsApplicable Security:
City Bank issued FDR, DPS, WEDB/USDIB/USDPB
Other Bank/NBFI issued FDR, WEDB/USDIB/USDPBLoan to Value (LTV) ratio:
Up to 90% for City Bank issued securities
Up to 85% for other bank/NBFI issued securities
Up to 75% for WEDB/USDIB/USDPB (in both cases)
\n Eligibility\n: Minimum personal income: BDT 15,000/- monthly*Condition applied
